binding:binding.name: One-Wire Binding
binding:binding.description: The OneWire bus system is a lightweight and cheap bus system mostly used for sensors like, temperature, humidity, counters and presence.
binding:binding.author: Dennis Riegelbauer

parameter.name: retry
parameter.label: Retry count
parameter.description: The retry count in case no valid value was returned upon read.

parameter.name: tempscale
parameter.label: Temperature scale
parameter.description: Defines which temperature scale owserver should return temperatures in.

parameter.name: post_only_changed_values
parameter.label: Changes only
parameter.description: Only changed values are posted to the event-bus.
